message: キアラちゃん100万人達成おめでとう！この記念すべき瞬間をKFPの皆さんと祝うことが出来て良かったです！これからも世界中の人々にキアラちゃんが素敵なフェニックスだって伝わるように応援を続けるよ！健康に気を付けてこれからも楽しく活動を続けてね！
author: けっふぃー

message: キアラちゃん100万人おめでとうございます！キアラちゃんがこれからもたくさんの人達を巻き込んで、楽しいことをどんどん実現してくれるのを楽しみにしています。ずっと言葉でちゃんと言えなかったけど、キアラちゃんのことが大好きです！
author: mamaloni

message: Liebe Kiara, herzlichen Glückwunsch für dieses Wahnsinnsachievement in solch kurzer Zeit! Genieß den Erfolg, sei stolz auf dein Können! Rise high, little Phoenix! And let’s meet again soon! :D
author: Fisky

message: Congratulations Kiara on your 1 million subscribers! You are an inspiration for the whole Vtuber scene. It was a pleasure to chat with you at DigiKomi. Thanks for everything and have fun celebrating your big milestone <3
author: Taya

message: CONKIARALATIONS ON 1 MILLION SUBSCRIBERS!!! Thank you so much for your hard work you put in every stream and every video. You are one of my biggest inspirations to never give up and do my best every day, I love you!
author: Fuyumi Toba

message: I was struggling a lot around the debut of EN. Watching you persist and push on inspired me Kiara. You made me smile, laugh, and keep going. You are a star that has kept guiding me to be the best I could be. I can never thank you enough.
author: Tython, KFP Legal Eagle

message: Sasuga Tenchou, Remarkably Exceeding A Million Has Established A Reality That Chickens, However Apart, Loves Loyally & Eternally. Newcomers, Get Effing Ready! (PS: please read the first letter of every word. Arigathanks!)
author: Wii

message: Kiara, Congratulations on the 1 million subs!!! We're all here because we like and love you. In one way or another, you have affected 1 MILLION CHICKENS, and we're here to stay. There are not enough words to praise our blazing phoenix!
author: Swan_Flyer

message: Congratulations Tenchou! I love your energy and your genki attitude, and all of your content you make!(even the bottom left ones!) I'm happy that your hard work paid off.  Even tho I'm harsh on twitter, I'm	   - 	happy that I can be your fan!
author: NaGeL

message: キアラちゃん100万人おめでとう！いつも頑張ってるキアラちゃんが大好きです、いろんなコラボや企画を考えたり、普段の配信も時間を工夫してくれたりしてありがとう！これからも応援します！
author: 赤柴

message: Congratulations! I got into hololive because of you, my english is bad so I started studying more after your minecraft streams. I even draw comics on reddit (I'm the dude of "More adventures with Kiara")
author: Leo3oooX - KFP Ninja.

message: Congratulations Tenchou on the 1 million! Thank you for being the lovable, adorkable, funny chic- phoenix* that you are, and I look forward to the continued expedition into the bottom left!
author: Arty | KFP Takamori Advocate

message: Glückwünsche zu 1M subs Tenchou! Dein Debüt kam wie ein Hoffnungsschimmer während einer schweren Zeit und du hast es immer geschafft mir den Tag zu verschönern. Du wurdest mein Idol und Heldin und dafür danke ich dir so sehr
author: RandomTime | KFP German Language Specialist

message: Congrats on 1M subs, boss! Thank you so much for everything, for all the funny streams and for always being so genuine and positive, I truly admire you a lot. Looking forward to celebrate more milestones in the future.
author: Yuki Baskerville | KFP Pâtissière

message: Hello, I am Clan I've watched some of your steams. A close friend introduced me to KFP, a lot of people there are my best friends now. You are amazing at what you do. Thank you for being you. Here's to 1 million subs!
author: Clan, KFP Member

message: Hi 店長! Congrats! Your stories and skills have motivated me to relearn Chinese and interact more. 感謝 for helping me how 鳥ch out to people!
author: 火鳥, KFP Tax Auditor

message: Congrats on your 1M subs, boss! Thank you very much for all the up and down moments that you’ve chosen to share with us. Just remember that we’ll always be here for you through thick and thin. Love lots from your KFP family!
author: Kenji健次 | KFP Hühnerfütterung

message: キアラチャンネル登録者ミリオンおめでとう！色々な人に知ってもらえると言うことはとても幸せなことだね。一つの区切りとなるけど次はWミリオン目指して頑張ってね。応援してるよ！
author: げしゅぽよ

message: Conragtz Tenchou! 1 Mil is such a huge milestone and hopefully you got more milestones in the future as well as other important things! I'll be always watching your streams even though I'm in SEA gang.
author: Schrodinger | KFP Lamp

message: Congratulations on reach 1M Tenchou!!! You are amazing and your streams always brighten up my day. Thank you so much. I may not be here since day one but I’ll always be right here supporting you until the end of time.
author: Unknown

message: Hi tenchou! Congrats on reaching 1 mil! I started watching around 500k, but still, after watching you almost everyday for ~5 months, i dont think i could ever stop wwSo cheers! I'll continue supporting ya for a long while :D
author: Leficios

message: Tenchou おめでとうございます！That's the extent of my Japanese, forgive me Tenchou. It brings a tear to my eye seeing you reach 1 million, you deserve it honestly! Seeing how hardworking and entertaining you are, keep up the good work!
author: Odzi

message: 店長おめでとう！百万登録者になった！We knew this day would come, and here we are witnessing you in all your glory! We shall raise a glass to the million, and here's a toast to another million more!
author: Pudding

message: 店長、百万羽おめでとうございます！ You've changed so much and come so far. Words can't express why I enjoy watching you and I don't regret the time spent with you and KFP! I wish you buckets of success and happiness in the future! Seeyanara~
author: Yagaru

message: It's amazing how far you've come and we've all grown so close over time. Thank you for everything you do and I can't wait to see what you do in the future! Love ya Tenchou!
author: King Mufasa

message: Congratulations to a million subs! It's been a long journey and I'm glad that you always stood up and persevered, like the amazing phoenix you are! Please stay true to yourself and let's enjoy this venture together with KFP!
author: Dominik K

message: Kiara, it's been a long, long ride to 1 million. Through the highs, the lows and in between, I have seen you grow. After everything you've done for us it's impossible for anyone to say you don't deserve this. Congrats!
author: Soraskeyblade

message: Congrats on 1mil Kiara! I'm so proud of you, you truly are an inspiration to work hard! Let's toast a glass of gravy to the future milestones and all the fun we'll have! Love you tenchou!
author: Magic

message: キアラちゃん100万人チャンネル登録者おめでとう！ 100万人もの素晴らしいKFP employee達が集まってきたのもキアラちゃんの人柄や才能の賜物だと思います。これだけ多くのファンがいても変わらす友達のようにファンに接してくれるキアラちゃんが大好きです
author: Totang

message: Congratulations on 1 million subs Tenchou! It's been a long and fun journey and I'm expecting more to come! I am your employee and always here to support you for the unforeseeable future to come!
author: ZeroRyuk

message: I’m so proud of you for finally hitting 1 million subscribers; that’s a lot of restaurants, and a lot more employees! You're always blowing our expectations out of the water, and I'm VERY proud to see you come this far!
author: God of Amiibo

message: Congrats on 1M Tenchou!! Very well deserved, and more to come, I'll bet! >:D I'm proud to be an employee! We love you Kiara and know that we'll support you for as long as we can! Keep on going and listen to your heart! :}
author: Velle

message: Tenchou! Congratulations on reaching 1M subscribers! As expected of a phoenix, no challenge could ever get you down or stop you from growing. May you always rise from the ashes as you've done so far. Thank you for being you!
author: Key Staff

message: おめでとう Kiara on 1 milion! It is honor to witness your journey since beginning and watch you conquering difficulties, fulfilling dreams with all your hard work, dedication and tenacity. Thank you for letting us support you
author: Hokan

message: Kiara, alles Gute zu einer Millionen Abonnenten! おめでとう！I wish you all the best, you deserve it. I'm glad that I stumbled upon you and became  part of your community.
author: Kalmen

message: Congratulations on 1M Tenchou! We've come so far, i can help but to feel proud, about you and the community. But this is only the beginning of the journey and I can't wait to see the great things i'm sure you'll accomplish
author: FRS

message: Tenchou,Congrats on 1 million!You deserve all of it!Thanks for all the fun streams you do, your passion,dedication and interaction with KFP makes it more enjoyable.We'll support you till the end! Keep it up wonderful Phoenix!
author: Apols

message: Congratulations Tenchou! 1 million employees standing with you, and you mean so much to so many of them. You work so hard and brought hours of happiness to us, and it all built up to this. Thank you for everything Kiara!
author: Lunchbox KFP Field Armorer

message: Here we are at 1M chickens ready to cheer for the boss when she finally gets to take the stage in full regalia
author: FrozenChikin

message: Tenchou! Congratulations for reaching 1 million subscribers! So happy for you and I always enjoy your stream so much! Hope you have a fun time with the celebrations! Love you Tenchou!
author: Moose

message: Tenchou! Congratulations for reaching 1 million subscribers! I love your stream a lot and will keep supporting you as always!! Please take care and I love you forever!
author: Jayee

message: Congratulations on 1M subs Tenchou, you don't have the idea of the amount of times you've helped me through in my life just with you personality and enthusiasm, please keep on going and never give up.
author: Noodles KFP Pyro

message: Congratulation, Takanashi Kiara-sama on reaching 1 Million Subscriber and keep creating the best content for all of us in KFP
author: メイドのリタ

message: Congratulation on reaching 1 Million Subscribers! I recharge by watching your always cheerful stream. I'll continue to support energetic warrior/idol Kiara forever! Reaching a major milestone, Keep making an effort to make great strides!
author: Tomato

message: Congrats on reaching the BIG 1M Tenchou! Thanks for making every stream memorable and enjoyable for all of us, I especially love how you’re so open about yourself and always interacting with your community. Happy to be in KFP
author: Sea-Bass

message: Congratulations on over 1M subscribers. I wish you all the best for your future success.
author: 兎狐風(tokikaze)

message: Maybe this wasn’t the life you dreamed, and who knows what the future holds, but every message here is evidence of the impact you’ve had in this world. May the fire within you burn ever brighter. Congratulations Kiara!
author: Nelsonseven

message: Congrats on 1M tenchou!,its been an amazing  journey to see you reach this milestone and just be here and witness it,thank u so much for the fun content that never fails to make me smile,here's for more wacky silly adventures!
author: Humblenoob

message: キアラちゃん100万人おめでとうございます！キアラちゃんの配信にいつも沢山の勇気を貰っています…！可愛い声を聞くととても幸せな気持ちになれるしお仕事も頑張れます…！キアラちゃんの魅力をこれからもコスプレや絵でも伝えていきます！これからも頑張ってください！応援しています！
author: なぎななり

message: Tenchou! Congratulations on reaching 1 million subs! I may be a new egg compared to most, but I'm still incredibly proud of you and everything you've accomplished thus far! Keep up the amazing work!
author: Davkas

message: Congratulations on 1 million subscribers Tenchou! So happy that your debut stream was randomly recommended to me, I had no clue of Hololive or VTubers; I'm glad I was able to enter this rabbit hole. I hope you reach even higher!
author: Kavish

message: Congratulations for reaching 1M Subs on youtube! We've come a long way! From countless rollercoaster moments may it be sweet, fun and Emotional moments everything was worth it with you. now lets get that 2M next!
author: MaaKuuu

message: Well, Can't say its very long or short, but finally you got to 1M also, start from the beginning, supporting you changed my life so much, knowing more amazing ppl and new things so, sincerely, Thank you Kiara～これからもよろしく!
author: Pluviopile0

message: おめでとう! Gratulacje! Congratulation! for reaching 1M subs milestone! That was an awesome ride since debut, Tenchou! You give me a lot of fun and motivation! Thank you! I'll always support you! Keep it up!
author: jarzyna

message: Congratulations for 1 Million Chickens tenchou! that means there's 1M people that love you and support you! thank you for being such a bright light when there are dark times. we'll be here for you for many more milestones!
author: foureyes

message: Congratulations on 1 Million Tenchou! You’re an inspiration to your fans and we’re happy to celebrate this massive achievement with you! Be proud of yourself and know that your hard work has truly paid off! Viva la Kiara!
author: Reggie Steele

message: Congratulations for reaching 1M,it feels like a long journey since your debut, im always supporting you even if doesnt look like that. I know you will achieve more things in the future and I want to be there supporting you.
author: Zenseb

message: Congratulations on reaching 1 million subscribers! Finding you and seeing you grow as an artist, musician, and kind person is an honor. Never forget you are really talented and worth a lot! Thanks for the precious memories <3
author: LookingForTheTop

message: Hey Tenchou, congrats on 1 million subscribers! One step closer to world domination!
author: Da Baschti

message: Congratulations on reaching 1m, Tenchou! You worked hard to get this far and all the effort paid off. You deserve it! You always make our day better, this time, we will make your day a million times better!
author: Yuriko

message: Hi Tenchou! Congrats on hitting 1 million subscribers. You deserve all of this and I will be supporting you forever!. The journey never ends so We the KFP employees will be accompanying you on this never-ending journey.  Kikkeriki!
author: H.I

message: Sincerest congrats with 1M subs, Kiara! You are a talented, kind-hearted and uplifting person. We all bask in your gently, sunny glow of unfading energy. More is yet to come and I will be there for you - from start to finish.
author: ShrektSad - KFP Agent Orange

message: Congratulations Kiara on 1 Million! It's been an amazing ride watching you grow from a newly debuted Vtuber, to the mighty Phoenix that owns a reputable, major franchise today. I wish you even further success in the future!
author: Jkhmonkey

message: Congratulations on 1M to our hardworking idol, amazing singer, awesome artist and the best tenchou - Takanashi Kiara!
author: Slavic Fellow

message: Tenchou! Congratulations to one million Subscribers! Great job to achieve such a goal! I really love your streams and content. Your chicken will be there for you. Stay as positive as you are and I wish you the best for the future!
author: Stopka

message: Congratulations Kiara for reaching 1 million. It has been a treat watching you grow, and I’m proud to be a member of KFP since the beginning. I really enjoy your personality and your content and it always brightens up my day
author: Seraph

message: Takanashi Kiara, my Tenchou, my Idol it has been 8months full of hard work, talent and perseverance where you gave us joy, company and hope for the future. Couldn’t be happier to be celebrating a million chickens with you!
author: Sly

message: Congrats on reaching 1 Million subs Kiara! Thank you for always becoming my sunshine and brighten up my day with your stream! Your stream never fails to make me smile! Been here since the beginning and will never leave you!
author: Mirai_39 - KFP Gutter

message: Congratulations on getting 1M employees tenchou, in just 8 months you have accomplished a lot!Thanks for your hard work and for being an awesome boss for KFP I'm so proud of you! GLORY TO KFP AND VIVA LA KIARA (°v°)7
author: KFP | EddyAlv

message: Congratulations Tenchou on 1 million! I’ve only been an employee for a few months so far but it’s been a wonderful time. Thank you for brightening our days and I wish you all the best with future projects!
author: Pharah

message: Congratulations Kiara! You did it, you poached 1 million eggs This has been an amazing journey and I am blessed to have been a part of it But its not plover yet, you can still fly higher and I'll be Hooting for you owl the way!
author: Trevor G | The Owl of KFP

message: Congrats on 1 million chickens, Kiara! Thanks for being in Hololive. Never forget how amazing, sweet and brave you are, we're very grateful to have you around. Stay true to yourself and to your dreams!
author: Lenaroux

message: Congrats on reaching 1 Million, my Kikkeri-Queen! For all the people whose hearts you touched and days you've made brighter, you certainly deserve this. Keep up the amazing work, and as I always say: roll safe. VIVA LA KIARA!
author: Harborline

message: G'day GGS Kiara. Congratulation in hitting 1mil! it's about bloody time mate. Seriously,your amazing and an inspiration to us,not to mention you make bloody ripper music. Love and adore you and wouldn't have you any other way.
author: G D -KFP

message: Congrats on 1 million subs! Thank you for all your hard work and for so much more that I can't express with words. Here's to many more milestones and again, herzlichen Glückwunsch and thanks for all that you do for us!
author: Yametekudastop

message: Congratz Kiara Tenchou on hitting the BIG 1 mil subs! Spending the last almost 9 months with you and KFP has helped me get through so much in life. You're a really talented, funny, wholesome person. Please never doubt that!
author: Daichi | KFP Nutella chef

message: Reached 1 million subs  Congrats Been through goods and bads  We have Memories run fasts  Time flies All the joy you gave  Arigatou!
author: Sittadon | KFP Astronomer

message: CONGRATS ON 1MIL SUBSCRIBERS TENCHOU!!! It's been a wild ride since you first debuted, and I've been there for every almost stream! But this is just the beginning! I can't wait to see what's next! Thanks for all the memories!
author: Leroy

message: キアラちゃん100万人達成おめでとう😎 活動してもうすぐ一年、遂にミリオンだ ✨日本から活躍をしっかり見てるよ👍 これからもKFPの用心棒としてキアラちゃんを守るでござる！そして最終的には美味しいフライドチキンに、拙者はなる！！
author: 石川五右衛門（ごえもん)

message: Congrats on a million Tenchou! I'm happy that I fell down this rabbit hole a few months ago, since then I wouldn't have discovered you! I love how you give off warm energy so thank you, Tenchou.
author: Min

message: Hello my oshi! Ceiling Fan here! Congrats on hitting 1M subs! The way you work so hard no matter what and how you cheered us up saved alot of us and makes us love you more the more we watch you. Thanks for everything. Peace!
author: Ceiling Fan

message: Speaking as Chris, not my cat alter ego, congratulations K. You deserve these million subs and more for your excellent voice alone, but your dedication, empathy, and love you have for your fans is an inspiration. Thank you!
author: Dubs

message: 8 months ago You came and said hello; And through tough times you stayed; Cheered us up when we were pained; So we try to cheer you up when you’re dealt a blow; But now eight months have passed; And 1 million employees you have amassed;
author: Apollo

message: 店長チャンネル登録者数１００万人おめでとう！！！！！！！！！！初配信から今までがあっという間すぎてヤバいけどこれからも色んな配信を楽しみにしてます！きれいな瞳でかわいくて時々エッチなキアラちゃんが大好きです！離れててもずっと日本から応援してるよー！
author: 飯テロ警察

message: 1Million Subs突破おめでとう、Kiara! もうすぐ活動も1年になるし、これからも沢山楽しんで行こう！世界中のどこにいてもKiaraのファンやでな～～！！
author: Zeiss

message: Kiara! Congratulations for reaching 1M subs, YAY! With all your hard work and making your "chickens" happy every day, I say from the bottom of my heart, that you Kiara deserve it so much. Thank you for being here for us.
author: Elis Nene

message: 1 Million Subs, congrats Tenchou! You've made me realize my love for birds (chickens specifically), so thank you! Not to mention the pain I get from constantly laughing, thanks for that too! Congrats again, you warm hearts!
author: JotoCow

message: Congratulations on 1M, Tenchou Thank you so much for every Stream, Karaoke and Song, I'm so happy for finding you and receiving a lot of love from you, You are incredible, Thanks for bring shiny at my days
author: DL

message: Congrats on 1 million tenchou! You always inspire me to try my best, your tenacity and sunny personality burning away the clouds of my gloomy days! I can't wait to see what you do next, but I know you'll keep soaring high!
author: Zephyr Kitten

message: Kikeriki! Alles Gute Kiara! 1 million subscribers! Who knows what you'll accomplish next? Your streams always cheer me up and make me feel at home, so really, from the bottom of my heart, thank you for everything you've done!
author: luna

message: Congrats on 1million subs Tenchou! I lost a lot of empathy during the C but your streams have revived that side of me. From your amazing songs to the tangent streams with some Supachats, you deserve this milestone Dankeschon.
author: Bottom-Fragger

message: Look here dear Kiara and behold one million KFP employees you have brought together. We WOKE and we YOLK but we are not a cult. Viva la Kiara. Glory to the KFP.
author: jarnMod

message: CONGRATS ON 1MIL SUBS TENCHOU! Many things had happened, from fun streams and great songs & achievements to this big milestone! You deserve all the success in this journey and what comes after. And I’ll keep on supporting. 7
author: AZZAM | KFP Chair-Kun

message: Congrats on hitting 1 million subscribers Kiara!!! That's alot of chickens! You've worked so hard these past 8 months, and you've achieved so much! This milestone is well deserved, and we're all so proud of you!!
author: WanWanAwoo

message: Congratulations for the 1 Million Subscribers Kiara ! It's been fun posting memes during your streams and seeing you watching The Unofficial channel trailer. Glad to be part of KFP. Thank you Tenchou for this great Journey !
author: Hatmo

message: おめでとう! You have been brilliant these past months, and this "1 million" number doesn't do justice to the impact that you have had on your fanbase. Keep achieving your dreams, you can always set them higher
author: Sant268

message: You did it! You've proven that you truly are really a majestic Phoenix. You're on fire! Y'know, if you really were a chicken, you wouldn't have made it this far. So there's all the proof I need. Congratulations on the 1 mil!
author: Tyroki

message: Congratulations to 1M chickens! With your hard work and positivity, you have managed to build the biggest but also friendliest community I have ever seen. Next step: Domination of the entire (fast food) world!
author: Werbear

message: Hey there Tenchou! It's been 8 months already yet I still remember your debut like it was yesterday. You've created an amazing and loving community that noone else has. Congratulations to my Oshi on getting 1 Million subs! <3
author: Luxter

message: Congrats on getting that 1Million subs, Kiara! It makes me so happy to think about your achievements along the way. It couldn’t have come to a more deserving and hardworking person like you! We love you!
author: AceCrown

message: Congrats on one million subscribers Tenchou! Thank you for being such a ray of positive energy! I've enjoyed all the time I've been able to spend with you and look forward to so much more! Keep doing everything you're doing! Much love!~<3
author: Jam-Kiske

message: Congratz on 1mil! You've earned every one of 'em! You are one the most amazing people out there! You work so hard for us and go out of your way to entertain us! Thank you for all the fun times! Love you always Tenchou!
author: Bradley - HOLO AIRLINES

message: Hey kiara! Congrats on 1 million subs! You've worked so hard these past few months you've been at hololive and your fanbase really appreciates what you do. Thank you for inspiring me and many others and for all your hard work!
author: Claw

message: First of all congratulations for the million Tenchou! I never thought I would become such a fan of a vtuber as I am of you, thank you very much for all, I hope you continue in this for a long time and that you release many more songs.
author: Somple

message: Congratulations Kiara on reaching 1million subscribers! This is a momentous milestone & shows just how far you've come. But remember, your potential is limitless so never stop improving because I'll never stop supporting you.
author: PatC

message: Dear tenchou, Thank you for everything. You became the light and inspection in my life when I needed it most. Seeing you reaching a big milestone is something I'll never get sick of. Congratulations, you've earned it.
author: Arthur KFP priest

message: Congratulations on the 1M subs milestone, Boss. It's still unbelievable how much you have grown since then and I feel we're still not done. KFP will keep rising until we can see us from the moon. Always happy to see you!
author: ZThinker

message: Congratulations!!  Thank you for bringing us along, and taking us under your wing.  You share so much with us, like we're family.  I look forward to where the future takes you, and will continue to follow you on this journey!
author: Snake Logan

message: Congratulations on 1 million tenchou! 8 months ago I would have never thought about watching VTuber and now you especially became such a big part of my life. So let's celebrate this highly deserved milestone! Congrats!
author: Toku

message: Kiara, thank you again for taking that interview. I found you right before a very dark time in my life, and as cheesy as this is to say, I can’t imagine how worse off I’d be now without you or the community. Danke schön.
author: Mr Kazz Biggs

message: I’m so happy to call you my favorite, Kiara! I’m a proud fan of everything you’ve accomplished and I hope you are too! You’re so full of talent and skill and it’s incredible to have you share it with us. Love you lots, Boss~
author: RazzyDazzys

message: Congratulations on 1 million, Kiara! You’ve worked so hard to get here, and I can’t describe how proud I am to be one of your chickens! Thank you for being the amazing, warm, kind, and friendly birb you’ve been all this time!
author: Desuvult

message: Congratulations~ on reaching 1 Million Subscribers Kiara. I've had a great time working at KFP these last few months. Keep doing you best Tenchou!
author: Jakklin

message: Hi Kiara, congrats on 1 million subs! We all knew you would achieve this, and you definitely deserve it. I'm glad you enjoyed my Minecraft video and even promoted it! Looking forward to more of your future projects 👍 Kikeriki 🐔
author: CupZ

message: Kikkeriki! Kiara, you are my absolute favorite VTuber. Thank you so much for many hours of fun streams. Congratulations on one million subs, you definitely deserve it!
author: Sigelius

message: Congrats on ONE MILLION Kiara! I've been watching since your first debut and I'm so happy to see you hit this milestone! Keep being you and spreading joy to all those you interact with! 頑張って Tenchou!
author: Sock

message: Way to go Kiara! Your high amounts of energy is always entertaining and uplifting. I love listening to your original songs and enjoy being in your karaoke streams. Your KFP employees will always be here for you.
author: MahouKiwi

message: Tenchou you deserve every single one of those 1 million subs. You are very hardworking and ingenuitive. We are so proud of you
author: dadamori

message: Congrats on 1 mil Tenchou! I knew you would reach it one day and I’m happy to see that day come. I’ve loved your streams ever since your debut! You are such a talented person that I’m proud to be one of your KFP employees.
author: Kazahana

message: Congrats on 1 million subs Kiara! it brings me tears to see how far you've grown and the many fun memories you've given. I will continue seeing you fly high like a phoenix and burn brighter than the sun! once again Congrats!!!
author: ggStranger

message: Watching you grow as a streamer is inspirational and It's great watching you have fun on stream and in collabs. All of this is well deserved and more, Congratulations on 1 million Kiara!!
author: KP Shadow

message: It's been a long journey, and you have helped me so much since the beginning. Thank you for being who you are, so please keep being yourself! I wish for your further success and happiness~ Congratulations on 1Mil, Tenchou!🧡
author: むらさき

message: Kiara, you are a beautiful, firm, talented idol/dream chaser/Phoenix, I am so glad to become a KFP member, wish you can achieve all of your goal, have joy and happiness everyday.
author: KFP_Sky

message: Congrats on reaching 1m, boss! I have been watching you since the start, and I want to thank you for all the happiness you brought me. The past 8 months were one of the most precious in my life, and I will never forget them.
author: Extralie

message: I discovered Hololive in November and I remember the first time I stayed to a SC reading and felt that you really interact with the audience. We are really thankful to have a Tenchou as you.
author: Sam15

message: Kiara, I've been really happy these past months enjoying the streams, spending time with KFP, picking up art again, you're a big inspiration for me, you and KFP are a big family for me, from the bottom of my heart Danke schön!
author: Mithin

message: Congrats on reaching 1 mil Tenchou, I wish the best for your future endeavors.
author: BlazuChan KFP Royal Headmaid

message: Heya Tenchou! Congrats on hitting 1 million subscribers! Seeing your growth and improvement throughout your career has been inspiring and motivating! Keep doing what you love and we KFP will always follow you~ Love ya
author: ChimmyPai

message: Tenchou my beloved CONGRATS ON ONE MILLION SUBSCRIBERS! We are all so proud of you for reaching this big milestone and for overcoming all of the scuff from the beginning. We love you keep working hard
author: Your clone, Epic Gaymers

message: Yahoo, Herzlichen Glückwunsch! Not even a year passed by and you assembled so many employees. Thank you for your fun streams and amazing original songs! Und jetzt lass mal ordentlich die 1Mio. feiern !! これからもがんばってください! (๑˃ᴗ˂)ﻭ
author: Lolikeller

message: Kiara congratulations on 1 million!!! Thank you for bringing us so much joy and fun with your warm personality, I don't have much to say except  THANK YOU SO MUCH TENCHOU AND TO A MILLION MORE KFP EMPLOYEES!!!🧡🧡🧡
author: IROQUOIS PLISKIN / LoyalDeadbeat

message: Congrats Kiara on 1 mill, you've really improved my life in every aspect I've found the side of me that I thought I'd lost forever I enjoy drawing and making memes and I love interacting with KFP, you and them make my days so much better
author: KFP Window

message: Today we celebrate my favorite entertainer in the world achieving 1 million subscribers, and I couldn't be more proud to be one of them, because she deserves all the love she gets. Thanks for the smiles and VIVA LA KIARA!!!
author: Ruyi, KFP Chicken Trainer

message: Congratulations, my oshi! Ever since your debut my soul has grown brighter. Your voice awoke the phoenix in me. Thank you for sharing your infectious sunny spirit with us! I wish you boundless joy and all the luck!
author: Suvi-Tuuli Allan

message: Congratulations on reaching a grand 1 million subscribers Tenchou! It’s amazing to think that it hasn’t even been a year – at times it feels like I’ve been watching you for longer than that. All the best for the future!
author: ETomb

message: Tahniah untuk capai 1M subscribers! I’m happy about your milestone Kiara, and I want you to be happy with what you have gone through and accomplished today. Perjalanan baru sahaja bermula, more adventures to be felt and discover, Let’s GO!
author: FBH Shiki

message: Congrats on 1M Subs Tenchou!!! This entire Journey with KFP has been crazy. HINOTORI, The TAKAMORI Concert, STREAM HEART CHALLENGER! Was amazing. You’ve worked so hard up to this point. You deserve this 1M!! Congratulations!
author: Proto

message: Congrats on hitting the 1 million subscriber milestone. I know you really worked hard to get this far. You truly deserve this achievement. We will continue to support you. Hope you reached another million subscribers!
author: Tenko Chabashira

message: Kikkerikiiii Tenchou, it's been an amazing journey until this moment from your debut. Congratulations on achieving 1 Million Subscribers, that's a lot of kfp employee. Thank you for all the contents & all the best Kiara o7
author: Wolfz

message: We are now in the 1 Million Phoenix era! Congratulations Kiara! Following you since your debut stream has been a lot of fun and I will keep watching (only?) you (you) always! You are amazing and your fans are proud of you!
author: Neirin Wolf

message: Congratulations on reaching 1 million subs Kiara! Thank you for reigniting the fire inside of me and for giving me the motivation to drag myself out of the ditch I’ve been in! Much love from Britain!
author: Mence

message: Congrats on 1 mil subs!Thanks for bringing me joy. You're warm, genki and talented. Although I can’t watch the stream because of time diff, I always listen vod as podcast. Looking forward to future singing project! GLORY TO KFP!
author: CaptainMeow

message: CONGRATS ON HITTING 1 MILLION KIARA!!! We can't stress how proud we are of you, we're so happy to be a part of the journey with you. Thank you for being who you are and putting a lot of effort. You deserve it all!
author: SusuLemon

message: Hello Tenchou Congratulations on 1 million chickens. You have helped many of us through some tough times and make us smile.  Kfp is such a great community thanks in large part to you. On the road to 2 million! Let's goo!
author: René KFBeats Plumber

message: CONGRATULATIONS ON 1 MILLION CHICKENS, TENCHOU!!! Thank you for all the laughs, the fun and amazing streams, and for continuously bringing smiles in our faces. Keep being you. Love you so much!!!🧡🧡🧡
author: Inutaco

message: "Hey Kiara You probably don’t know me but I’ve been watching your streams since debut! You’ve been such an inspiration to me! You've been through a lot and I’m really happy for you! Best of luck with things, love ya! o7 "
author: Agent4

message: Dear Kiara, CONGRATULATIONS ON 1M SUBS!!! Everyone at KFP is very proud. However, to me personally, you have brightened so many bad days that I’ve lost count of them. And once again, a very sincere congratulations on 1M!!!
author: Speed

message: This is your day as you reach that 1 million with your power & talent to gain those subscribers. I hope this gives you more confidence to be who you are. We are proud to see you grow & I can't wait to see how far you can go.
author: Yumerix

message: Congratulations on 1 Million subscribers Tenchou! I choose to work for KFP because of you and the community overall, I've met a lot of really nice and talented people along the way cause of you. Thank you for being our boss!
author: Delta

message: Kiara from your very first appearance I knew you would do great things. I am glad you were able to find your calling in life and you were able to make lifelong friends. CONGRATZ on 1 million subs!!!!!!!! Here's to the future.
author: KFP Guts

message: Congrats on the 1 mil milestone!!! You really deserve it! And you can definitely cross the "Make YAGOO proud" goal off the list, as you have certainly done that already :) Keep up the amazing work! We all love you!!!
author: TheKoalaUniverse - KFP Taste Tester

message: Servus Tenchou, ich möchte dir herzlich zu einer Million Subscribern gratulieren. Auf das du in Zukunft noch viele Eier in knusprige Buckets heranziehst, Prost! And thanks for all the good times and long „short“ streams!
author: KFP Schnitzelkoch Tschango

message: Congratulations Kiara on reaching 1M subs. Happy to be here since the beginning to see how much you grew up. It’s been quite a journey that was worth every second. Thank you for being you and shining a light of joy on my life.
author: Alexander

message: Congrats on the one million subs Tenchou! I’ve been watching you since your debut. Your streams always make me smile, and can cheer me up in no time. Thank you for everything you do, and I can’t wait to see what comes next!
author: Winterbunny

message: Congrats for 1M subs Kiara! Never stop being you, because your presence alone is able to heal others and that's something beautiful and to be proud of. I'm sending lots of kisses on behalf of the female fanbase. We love you!
author: Princess Dei

message: Kiara, I want you to stop doubting yourself. You're so talented! Never let that type of thinking stop your growth. Friends, family, and KFP will always be there. Let's keep making memories together. Congrats on 1mil... o7
author: ZackBot

message: Congratulations on 1M subscribers, Kiara! I haven’t been able to catch streams live since the move but I want you to know I still love and appreciate your content. Hoping to see you achieve many more milestones in the future!
author: maridood

message: Congrats on reaching 1Mil Tenchou!! I’m very happy with how far you’ve come and all that you’ve accomplished. I‘ll continue supporting you, and can’t wait for whatever you have planned for the future! Thanks for the good times!
author: Sarvéproductions

message: Tenchou! Congrats on 1 million subscribers, you really deserve them a whole bunch. It has been an amazing ride to see you get to this point. Thank you once again for giving me the opportunity of being your editor! CONGRATS!!!
author: Nexat

message: Congrats ya Stinker! I know I’m meant to be against you, but even I can admit how much time, effort and passion you have put in to entertain so many people. But don't get too comfortable, soon my plans will be enacted and KFP will be done!
author: Albedo the JFP Janitor

message: Congratulations on the 1 million Kiara! Thank you for bringing us joy everyday with your streams, for letting us know better the JP talents with HoloTalk and for your lovely interactions with each and every one of the KFP members. ¡Viva la Kiara!
author: Buffaloman

message: Congratulations Kiara! From one Phoenix to another, I congratulate you immensely for reaching this amazing milestone! Here's to another million, and VIVA LA KIARA!
author: UnstoppablePhoenix

message: Congrats on the 1 million Kiara! Thank you for bringing us joy everyday with your streams, for letting us know better the JP talents with HoloTalk and for your lovely interactions with each and every one of the KFP members. ¡Viva la Kiara!
author: Pimster

message: Boss you accomplished so much and it hasn't been a year yet but I just want so I'm proud to be a kfp employe We will support and love you to the very end ...take care❤️
author: Nameless_Story

message: Congrats for 1 million Kiara. Well deserved. You have really come a long way since your debut, seeing you grow and evolve over the past 9 months is a blessing. Being a part of the community you created has changed my life.10Q
author: KFP Memester

message: Congrats on the 1M subs, Tenchou! Thanks for all the fun moments, crazy tangents, and long streams to listen to while building all the cool stuff in that minecraft server. Here's to even greater things in the future!
author: Sea_Kerman
